resources.string: No gallery configured! Go to Menu->Settings to fix this !
The gallery url provided is not valid! Go to Menu->Settings to fix this !
Enter here the base name of your gallery, ex : http://myhost.com/gallery2

G2Android ( http://code.google.com/p/g2android/ ) is an open source (GPL v2 License) client for Gallery2 ( http://gallery.menalto.com ) running on the Android platform, developed and maintained by Anthony Dahanne ( http://blog.dahanne.net/about )
